snippet: Eight people were killed near a remote village in Guinea after a rock-hurling mob attacked them, claiming they had come to spread the Ebola virus.
abstract: Mob in Guinea kills eight government officials and journalists who came to the area to dispel rumors about the deadly Ebola outbreak.
lead_paragraph: Eight people were killed near a remote village in Guinea after a rock-hurling mob attacked them, claiming they had come to spread the Ebola virus.

headline.main: Fear of Ebola Drives Mob to Kill Officials in Guinea
headline.print_headline: Fear of Virus Drives Mob to Kill Officials
